nodes.text: Sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the Mandalorian Wars, the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders attacked the Galactic Republic-controlled Quermia system following a Mandalorian victory at the Makem star system. The Mandalorians triumphed in the Quermia system before going on to win a battle in the Kaelta system.

The battle in the Quermia system was referenced in 2009's The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry. The battle was only marked on the galaxy-wide map of the Mandalorian Wars instead of being described in prose.
